types.html:
ravi (feminine ravie, masculine plural ravis, feminine plural ravies)

  1. thrilled, overjoyed, delighted, ravished, chuffed
    • 2001, Alain Souchon, “La vie ne vaut rien”:
      Il a demandé leur avis à des tas de gens ravis / Ravis, de donner leur avis sur la vie
      He asked their advice from lots of delighted people / Delighted, to give their advice on life

title: ravi
pronunHtml:
• IPA(key): /ʁa.vi/
  • Rhymes: -i
